text: Ojos del Salado is a stratovolcano in the Andes range, in Argentina and Chile. It is the highest active volcano in the world. It is also the second highest mountain in America. The first people to reach the top were Justyn Wojsznis and Jan Szczepa≈Ñski in 1937. == References == Category:Mountains of Argentina Category:Andes Category:Volcanoes of Chile Category:Catamarca Province
title: Ojos del Salado
